title: i just got a client bug on my main when i was in champ select for flex for first provisional game
body:
shit logged me out and my friend said i lost a game. is this true? i lost 1 game in my provisionals out of my control?

here i was just saying i didnt know if i wanna play and the first thing that happens is a client crash sopposedly losing me a game.

please confirm

replies.body: A queue dodge does count towards provisional/placement games, though I don't believe that it's a loss.  Just a counted game.  Also, keep in mind that the new season has not started.  Any placements you do now are not the same as the new season once that approaches.  Rest easy!
but isnt a counted game a loss in the account regardless? i really wish it didnt even happen i had no control over the client or my ability to pick a champion which was voided for me.
